name: Crashday Redline Edition
description: Crashday, the explosive cult classic multiplayer racer, is back! Retooled and remastered, Crashday: Redline Edition brings back the fun and memories of the original with this lovingly crafted tribute edition, featuring all-new and expanded features, including Steam Workshop support. Today is Crashday!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32bit or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space
